ns2:testcase.ns3:title: FS-TEL-003/3.2.3.2/ID Capture/ Verify system must capture identification details whenever cashout is involved/Non Customer/ IRA Contribution
ns2:testcase.ns3:description:
For Non Customer transactions (as identified by the Customer/Non customer Radio button) the system will validate the number of IDs to be captured based on the ‘Identification Required for Non Customer’ parameter set up at the institution level. If this parameter is set as ‘2’, the system will require the following fields to be captured as part of the transaction:
Name : The name of the person performing the transaction. Primary Details: ID Type: The type of ID being used by the person performing the transaction. This is to be a selection set ID Issuer: the authority issuing the ID ID Number: The ID number of the ID type being used by the person performing the transaction ID Expiration date: The date which the present ID is to expire MM/DD/CCYY- if applicable
Secondary Details: ID Type: The type of ID being used by the person performing the transaction. This is to be a selection set ID Issuer: the authority issuing the ID ID Number: The ID number of the ID type being used by the person performing the transaction ID Expiration date: The date which the present ID is to expire MM/DD/CCYY- if applicable
Payee reference account : (Disabled for non customer):Mandatory if customer is selected and cash out greater then zero, optional otherwise. Type :Drop down includes D:DEP and L :Loan type of payee .reference account of the customer
Quick view : Link to launch a Quick View of the Payee / Reference account entered
Known: Check box available if the user knows the customer by name.
Success Criteria: The system must allow user to capture the identification details of the non-customer by providing standard fields for primary and secondary details on the transaction screen based on the parameter set a institution level.
ns2:testcase.ns3:creator: v070808

tag0:div.tag0:div:
Product: Teller
User: Authorized User
Type of Transaction: IRA Contribution
Screen: IRA Contribution transaction screen Institution Parameter - Create/Amend/Inquiry (Screen 31151)
-‘Identification Required for Non Customer’ parameter set up at the institution level must be set
-The conductor of the transaction must be a non customer
-Cashout must be involved in the transaction other wise the identification details section will be hidden
